#Generated by VisualGDB project wizard.
#Note: VisualGDB will automatically update this file when you add new sources to the project.

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 2.7)
project(LabNet)

set(LIBRARIES_FROM_REFERENCES -latomic -lpthread -lboost_system -lwiringPi so.5.7.0 -lprotobuf)

add_executable(LabNet LabNet.cpp Network/Connection.cpp Network/Connection.h Network/ConnectionManager.cpp Network/ConnectionManager.h Network/Server.cpp Network/Server.h Log/easylogging++.cc Log/easylogging++.h Interface/UART/SerialPort.cpp Interface/UART/SerialPort.h Log/LoggingFacility.h Log/StandardOutputLogger.h Log/EasyLogger.h Log/LoggerFactory.h Interface/UART/SerialPortMessages.h Interface/UART/SerialPortsManager.h Interface/UART/SerialPortsManager.cpp Interface/GPIO/GPIOManager.cpp Interface/GPIO/GPIOManager.h Interface/GPIO/Messages.h Interface/GPIO/DigitalInput.h Interface/GPIO/DigitalOutput.h Interface/SAM32/MAX14830.cpp Interface/SAM32/MAX14830.h Interface/SAM32/MAX14830_defs.h Interface/SAM32/MAXDevice.cpp Interface/SAM32/MAXDevice.h Interface/SAM32/spi.cpp Interface/SAM32/spi.h Interface/SAM32/SamMainActor.h Interface/SAM32/SamMainActor.cpp Interface/SAM32/DataReadWorker.h Interface/SAM32/DataReadWorker.cpp Interface/ManageInterfaces.h Interface/InterfaceMessages.h Interface/ManageInterfaces.cpp Interface/InitMessages.h Interface/GPIO/DigitalInputStateReader.h Interface/GPIO/DigitalInputStateReader.cpp Interface/SAM32/SamMessages.h Network/LabNetServerMessages.proto Network/LabNetClientMessages.pb.cc Network/LabNetServerMessages.pb.cc Network/LabNetClientMessages.pb.h Network/LabNetServerMessages.pb.h LabNetMainActor.h LabNetMainActor.cpp LabNetMainActorMessages.h Network/LabNetClientMessages.proto)

target_include_directories(LabNet PRIVATE ../sobjectizer/dev ../sobjectizer/dev Log Interface/UART)
set_property(TARGET LabNet PROPERTY CXX_STANDARD 17)
target_link_libraries(LabNet "${LIBRARIES_FROM_REFERENCES}")
add_subdirectory(../sobjectizer/dev dev)

add_compile_definitions(ELPP_THREAD_SAFE)
add_compile_definitions(ELPP_NO_DEFAULT_LOG_FILE)
FILE(COPY Log/logger.conf DESTINATION "${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}")
